1.0.name: wordpress/wp-most-simple-social-bookmarks
1.0.description:
This plugin is desifned for beginners as well as expert users. This plug-in, when installed, will display major social bookmarks after the post. All it needs is to upload and activate. No further configurations required at all. When installed, this plug-in will add 7 major bookmarking buttons after the end of post. These are twitter, delicious, digg, facebook, linked-in, yahoo & stumbleupon.

If you want to change the bookmarking button image, simply replace the image in /images folder. If you don't want to touch the code at all, please maintain PNG as an extension of image files.
